experience.title: SDE Intern
experience.description: Developed a full-stack Stock Alert App using React, Flask, MySQL, and Pandas to automate stock price monitoring, trigger alerts, and perform data analysis with dynamic user interfaces and robust backend integrations.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Trained a 'YOLOv8 model for AOI Detection' and Analysis of driver attention spans based on 'Gaze Parameters' with 93% accuracy, also generating literature review for the same. Wrote batch scripts to automate various processes (75% of tasks) as a part of my internship.

experience.title: Technical Intern
experience.description: Worked on SAP (ERP model) - Data Archiving (SARA and SARI modules). Accomplished all the assigned tasks with 100% accuracy.

achievements.title: Outstanding Performance Award
achievements.description: Recognized for exceptional contributions to the team's success.

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: First place in a 48-hour hackathon for developing an innovative solution.

ai_responses.who is abhinav: Abhinav Paidisetti is a software developer specialized in web technologies and AI. He has worked on various projects and has expertise in React, Node.js, and machine learning.
ai_responses.what are abhinav's skills: Abhinav is proficient in several programming languages including JavaScript, Python, and Java. He specializes in web development with frameworks like React, Vue.js, and has experience with backend technologies like Node.js and Express. He also has knowledge in machine learning and data science.
ai_responses.what projects has abhinav worked on: Abhinav has worked on several notable projects including a healthcare management system using AI, a real-time collaboration tool for developers, and an e-learning platform. Check out his experience section for more details.
ai_responses.education: Abhinav completed his Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from a prestigious university with honors. He has also taken various online courses to enhance his skills in specific areas of interest.
ai_responses.contact: You can reach out to Abhinav via email at abhinavpaidisetti@gmail.com or connect with him on LinkedIn.
ai_responses.default: I don't have specific information about that. Please ask me about Abhinav's skills, experience, education, or projects.
